Text: Taku Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini, E̩ ño̩ lo ta, kʼe̩ fe̩do̩ onobule̩ kʼonuku-wñ afe̩do̩-wñ le̩, kʼi ño̩ chʼajo̩ko̩, alu ku Jihofa a fe̩do̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l dagba ma chaka rida tʼugbo amo̩jo̩ omune̩, ku ma la fe̩do̩ e̩bo̩ e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma.
Abe̩le̩ tak u nʼo̩ko̩ ajifa me̩gwe̩lu kpai barli e̩ñwa homor oka kpʼe̩kpe̩reji fʼu la ñw O̩la-mi.
Tak u ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ki bʼumi gugu o̩jo̩ wewe; e̩ ki ño̩ jo̩ko̩ ge̩ n, e̩ ki la chʼo̩ya e̩ne̩ du n; abe̩le̩ omi ñʼade̩ ñw e̩ ge̩.
Todu amo̩ma Israe̩l ajo̩ o̩jo̩ wewe, ma nʼonu n, ma la anʼagboji n, ma anʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ache n, ma anʼojibo n, ma anʼe̩fo̩d kpai amudoji n.
Ubile̩ tak amo̩ma Israe̩l adabi, oñ ma atejane̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma kpai Defid onu-ma; ma la awʼugbo Jihofa kpai ugbo e̩nyo̩-wñ iko o̩jo̩ otitala kpʼailo era.
